long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of endlessly filling out job applications and going from application to rejection? FastApply is here to revolutionize the job search process for tech professionals with AI-powered automation. Whether youâ€™re looking to break into your dream role or transition to a new position, FastApply takes the grind out of job applications so you can focus on what matters: landing the job.

How It Works:
Quick Setup: Log in with Google to get started in seconds. Upload your existing resume and cover letter, and let FastApply do the heavy lifting.
Personalized Applications: Enter your job preferences, and our AI tailors your ATS-friendly resume and cover letter for each job you apply to.
Seamless Auto-Apply: Click 'Start Applying,' and FastApply will automatically search for jobs on LinkedIn, Indeed, and (coming soon) Glassdoor that match your preferences.
Real-Time Tracking: Monitor your job applications and stay up-to-date on the status of each submission from one dashboard.

Why Choose FastApply?
Smart AI Tailoring: Unlike other tools, FastApply doesnâ€™t just submit your existing resume. It customizes your resume and cover letter for each job to beat the ATS and boost your chances of landing an interview.
Motivating and Inspiring Experience: Our sleek, user-friendly interface makes the application process smooth, fast, and even a little fun. No more job search fatigue!
Flexible Pricing: Whether youâ€™re exploring new opportunities or actively job hunting, our plans fit your needs. Start with the Freebird plan and upgrade anytime for enhanced features.

Can I try FastApply for free?
Absolutely! Our Freebird Plan gives you access to all the core features without any cost. Experience the magic of auto-generated resumes and automated job applications before committing to a paid plan.

How long can I use the free plan?
Forever! The Freebird Plan is here to stay, giving you the freedom to use our essential features as long as you need.

Can I upgrade or switch plans anytime?
Yes, we offer complete flexibility. You can easily switch between plans to match your job search intensity and goals.

Ready to take off with FastApply?
Stop wasting time on tedious applications and start fast-tracking your career. With FastApply, you become the pilot of your job search journey, navigating effortlessly towards your next big opportunity.
